summary:
A medium size dungeon, lots of enemies, lots of loot
Bring torches, you will need them
descriptionHtml:
My 1st mod, please be gentle :)
A medium sized dungeon that should take about 1-2 hrs to complete depending on your gameplay settings
The location of this dungeon is North of Karthwasten and South West of Dragonsbridge ( follow the river )
Plenty of enemies for you to kill and plenty of loot, most enemies are set to medium - very hard difficulty and you could get swarmed by them,
It is set on 2 lvl\'s both of them quite dark, the 1st lvl is very dark, torches advised or Wearable Lanterns Mod helps massively ( highly recommended, find it on the Nexus )
I added a slightly boosted stats Ebony Greatsword for a reward ( enchanted too) nothing unique unfortunately ( i am still learning )
The recommended mods will enhance your gameplay during this dungeon, non are needed, just my preference for a much tougher Skyrim
Hope you have fun and die alot trying :)
 
Recommended Mods
Wearable Lanterns http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17416/?
Climates of Tamriel http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802/?
Enhanced Lights and Effects http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043/?
OBIS - Organized Bandits in Skyrim http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31264/?
E.R.S.O - Erkeil Real Skyrim Overhaul http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26217/?
Ultimate Combat http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36006/?
TK Combat http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29137/?
Skyrim Immersive Creatures http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24913/?
Monster Mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35631/?

Big ty to the authors of the above mods for making my skyrim experience almost impossible to play, love it :)

To Install use Nexus Mod Manager ( it should work, never uploaded before )
To Manual install just unrar file and drag/drop to Data folder
author: macdaddy1176
